arts.ttl: As Pogba nears return, Man City's Monaco visit offers glimpse of what might've been
arts.sum: Three years ago, Man City wanted to take Paul Pogba to the blue half of Manchester. Instead, he returned to Juve, where his career unraveled.

arts.ttl: Bernardo Silva unsure if new-look Man City ready for biggest titles as Rodri returns for Monaco game
arts.sum: Manchester City captain Bernardo Silva believes it’s too early to say if his team can be a contender for the biggest trophies this season. I would like to give you an answer but the reality is in the last six months a lot of things have changed,” Silva said Tuesday, a day before City’s Champions League match at his former club Monaco.
